named-query.name: ADDRESSES_BY_CUSTOMER_UIDS
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM CustomerAddressImpl address WHERE address.customerUidPk IN (:list)

named-query.name: ADDRESS_BY_CUSTOMER_UID_AND_STREET1
named-query.query: SELECT address FROM CustomerAddressImpl address WHERE address.customerUidPk = ?1 AND address.street1 = ?2
